jobs.jobTitle: Junior Web Developer in PHP and Laravel
bulletPoints: Developed web applications using PHP and Laravel for various sectors, including hotels, government, corporate, consultancy, and CRM.
Collaborated with the design team to implement responsive UI, ensuring cross-platform compatibility.
Contributed to the development of a Learning Management System (LMS), enhancing e-learning experiences.
Integrated external APIs such as Bunny Net for video streaming and Stripe for payment gateways.
Worked on Zoom API integration for communication features within the web applications.
Participated in code reviews and debugging sessions, ensuring code quality and adherence to best practices.
Worked closely with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time while maintaining client satisfaction.
Guided interns through coding best practices, emphasizing clean, efficient, and secure code.
Provided QA testing support, ensuring bug-free applications by identifying issues and implementing fixes in collaboration with the testing team.
Assisted in creating and reviewing security audit reports for government websites, ensuring compliance with security standards and identifying vulnerabilities.
